gwt.material.design.client.base.validator

Interface HasValidators<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTextWidget, AbstractValueWidget, Code, Italic, MaterialChip, MaterialDatePicker, MaterialDoubleBox, MaterialFloatBox, MaterialInput, MaterialIntegerBox, MaterialLabel, MaterialListBox, MaterialListValueBox, MaterialLongBox, MaterialNumberBox, MaterialRange, MaterialSearch, MaterialSwitch, MaterialTextArea, MaterialTextBox, MaterialTitle, MaterialValueBox, MaterialVideo, MaterialWeather, Pre, Small, Strong, ValidatorMixin

    public interface HasValidators<T>
extends ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers
    Should use when implementing classes with Validators.
    Author:
    Steven Jardine
